definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
see 肉豆蔻 nutmeg, 豆蔻 cardamon

sentences.english: In 2010Q2, Avene was only slightly behind Lancome.
For example, the Lancome Blanc Expert Mela Lotion toner goes for $35 on StrawberryNet.
sentences.chinese: 例如，蘭蔻美白霜白專家碳粉不用爲35美元的草莓。

sentences.english: There are a lot of high end companies that put out drugstore brands with one example being Lancome .
sentences.chinese: 有很多高端的公司推出的藥房品牌的一個例子是蘭蔻。

sentences.english: The Lancome public praise which money eye cream is?
sentences.chinese: 蘭蔻的口碑眼霜是哪款？

sentences.english: I was previously using Lancome, but yours is better and cheaper.
sentences.chinese: 我以前使用的蘭蔻，但你是更好更便宜的。

sentences.english: This product works perfectly and I have to admit that it actually out performs my Lancome powder.
sentences.chinese: 這個產品非常好，我必須承認它比我的蘭蔻更出色。

definition: Nivea, skin and body care brand
open shelves (in self-service store or user access library)
